--- select_select_limit_expr.sql
select ((select 1) limit 1 offset 0) + 3
--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Expr: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    end:      40,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    List:     parser.SelectExprList{
      &parser.SelectExpr{
        pos:  7,
        end:  40,
        Expr: &parser.BinaryExpr{
          Op:   "+",
          Left: &parser.SubQuery{
            pos:  7,
            end:  36,
            Expr: &parser.SubQueryExpr{
              end:  35,
              Expr: &parser.SubQuery{
                pos:  8,
                end:  18,
                Expr: &parser.Select{
                  pos:      9,
                  end:      17,
                  Distinct: false,
                  AsStruct: false,
                  List:     parser.SelectExprList{
                    &parser.SelectExpr{
                      pos:  16,
                      end:  17,
                      Expr: &parser.IntLit{
                        pos:   16,
                        end:   17,
                        Value: "1",
                      },
                      Star: false,
                      As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
                    },
                  },
                  From:    parser.FromItemList{},
                  Where:   nil,
                  GroupBy: parser.ExprList{},
                  Having:  nil,
                  OrderBy: parser.OrderExprList{},
                  Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
                },
              },
              OrderBy: parser.OrderExprList{},
              Limit:   &parser.Limit{
                Count: &parser.IntLit{
                  pos:   25,
                  end:   26,
                  Value: "1",
                },
                Offset: &parser.IntLit{
                  pos:   34,
                  end:   35,
                  Value: "0",
                },
              },
            },
          },
          Right: &parser.IntLit{
            pos:   39,
            end:   40,
            Value: "3",
          },
        },
        Star: false,
        As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
      },
    },
    From:    parser.FromItemList{},
    Where:   nil,
    GroupBy: parser.ExprList{},
    Having:  nil,
    OrderBy: parser.OrderExprList{},
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT ((SELECT 1) LIMIT 1 OFFSET 0) + 3
